short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Super crutch for your favorite campus website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatic display of subjects in the current semester: The extension automatically sets the values of the current academic year and semester in the <select> type fields at Current Control page current control year and semester autofill example

Fixes direct login disabled error: Fixes an error that sometimes occurs during the session refresh process. This is due to the fact that very experienced campus developers have not been able to fix this bug for years, which occurs due to an extra slash in the URL - https://campus.kpi.ua//login.php direct login disabled example
